org.resthub.core.service

Class GenericServiceImpl<T,ID extends Serializable,D extends GenericDao<T,ID>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.resthub.core.service.GenericServiceImpl<T,ID,D>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Domain model class managed, must be an Entity
    D - Generic DAO class
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    GenericService<T,ID>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractTraceableServiceImpl

    @Transactional(readOnly=true)
public abstract class GenericServiceImpl<T,ID extends Serializable,D extends GenericDao<T,ID>>
extends Object
implements GenericService<T,ID>
    Generic Service implementation.
